text: I'm looking for a conversation that got lost in the slack hole. I think <@UPUBAM63X> was involved, and it was about making Julia testing similar to rust by allowing the capability to include tests next to the functions that are tested. I might misremember, but I'm pretty sure sure a package that does exactly that was mentioned. Does anyone know about such a package?
